short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: see how much you spend on total for various websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this extension will let you see the total spending you have on any website that has the appropriate table & column. there should be a table with a column that says 'Amount' for this extension to work properly. this is useful for users, when a website doesn't calculate the total spending on a table it displays for it's users. this extension has an additional functionality that will auto-scroll to the bottom of the page automatically until there is no more loading by the website for rows on the page. this is needed for some websites.
